record.field: You cannot change the Product for a packaging which is associated to stock moves
You cannot change the Quantity by Package for a packaging which is associated to stock moves.
You cannot delete a packaging which is associated to stock moves.
You cannot change the Packaging Required for a product which is associated to stock moves.
Number of packages required for inventory line "%(line)s".
Number of packages must be positive in inventory line "%(line)s".
Package of inventory line "%(line)s" is not the same that the lot\'s package.
Quantity by Package is required for lot "%(lot)s" of inventory line "%(record)s".
Quantity by Package is required for package "%(package)s" of inventory line "%(record)s"
The quantity of inventory line "%(line)s" do not correspond to the number of packages.
